DOC.brief_summary: All household three zone Zambia 's Eastern Province invite attend community point distribution insecticide treat bed net ( ITNs ) . Households randomize different interval community health worker ( CHW ) hang-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Community Point Distribution Insecticide Treated Bed Nets
DOC.detailed_description: Households ask attend community point distribution ITNs one three zone Zambia 's Eastern Province . Households register receive ITNs randomize one five group receive CHW visit different interval . Group 1 visit 1-3 day distribution , group 2 visit 5-7 day , group 3 visit 10-12 day , group 4 visit 15-17 day , group 5 receive hang-up visit . Groups 1-4 categorize receive hang-up visit group 5 categorize receive hang-up visit . All household five group visit 7-11 week distribution 5-6 month distribution ass short- medium-term ITN retention usage .
DOC.criteria: Household preregistered National Malaria Control Centre receive ITNs ahead start study activity . Household locate one three study area Mukonka , Lukwipa , Chipeketi Rufunsa District , Zambia Household preregistered receive ITNs Household locate one three study area
